servinfo.title: P/S Pump Removal and Installation (F9Q Engine Model)

attention2.ptxt: Never disassemble P/S pump for diesel engine model. Disassembly will spoil its original performance. If faulty condition is found, replace it with new one.

attention3.ptxt: Be sure to clean each joint of suction and discharge sides thoroughly before removal.

s1.ptxt: Remove generator referring to Generator Dismounting and Remounting:For Diesel Engine Model .
Take out P/S fluid in reservoir with syringe or such.
Disconnect high pressure pipe and suction hose from P/S pump.

attention3.ptxt: As fluid flows out of disconnected joints, put a receptacle under joints or a plug to pipe.

s1.ptxt: Remove radiator inlet pipe No.1 bracket (3), and then remove P/S pump (2).

attention3.ptxt: Plug each port of removed pump to prevent dust or any other foreign matter from entering.

servinfosub.title: Installation
servinfosub.ptxt: Reverse removal procedure, and then noting the following instructions.

torqueitem.t-part: P/S pump high pressure pipe union bolt
